name: Rootforce
description:
As told by tales in the forest.

In times of great peril.

The roots of the mighty tree will unite!

The hammer will squash the thief.

The spear will impale the jumper.

The arrow will perish the airbourne.

Survive for the blessing of waters...

You are a ghost tasked by the mighty tree to defend it from its attackers.  It equips you with three of its powerful roots, use them wisely like foretold in the prophecy to defeat your foes. The tree also needs you to still gather water for it to stay alive.

CONTROLS:

Mouse:

  • next root -> wheel up
  • last root -> wheel down
  • direction -> mouse movement
  • move -> left button
  • boost -> middle button
  • attack -> right button

Keyboard:

  • next root -> E
  • last root -> Q
  • direction -> arrow keys
  • move -> shift
  • boost -> space
  • attack -> right ctrl

Controller:

  • next root -> right shoulder button
  • last root -> left shoulder button
  • direction -> left stick
  • move -> right trigger
  • boost -> south button
  • attack -> west button
